meanings.definition: A place where clothes and linens are washed and dried using coin-operated machines.
meanings.sent1: I need to wash my clothes at the launderette today.
meanings.sent2: Let's go to the launderette to clean our dirty clothes.
meanings.sent3: The launderette was so busy that I had to wait for a machine.
meanings.sent4: The launderette hummed with the sound of spinning washing machines.
meanings.sent5: The bright sign outside the launderette caught my eye as I walked by.

meanings.definition: To wash or launder clothes at a launderette.
meanings.sent1: I will launderette my bedsheets tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She prefers to launderette her delicate clothes at the nearby laundromat.
meanings.sent3: He decided to launderette his clothes after the camping trip.
meanings.sent4: The rain forced us to launderette our clothes instead of drying them outside.
meanings.sent5: Launderetting clothes at the launderette saves time compared to handwashing.
